query: <s> what did the group members think of the buttons of the remote control when discussing the desired features of remote control ?
answer: user interface : i also think we should not add too many buttons . industrial designer : alright . marketing : right . project manager : no that 's right . user interface : modern day uh remotes have too much buttons i think . project manager : y y you do n't use uh the half of them that 's that 's user interface : precisely . project manager : culture uh international . marketing : maybe we could make one button to switch between d_v_d_ player and tv user interface : yeah . marketing : and make the other buttons uh multi-functional or something . user interface : yeah indeed .
